tasks.label: playwright: smoke open and screenshot
tasks.command: node -e "(async()=>{const { chromium } = await import('playwright'); const b=await chromium.launch(); const p=await b.newPage(); await p.goto('http://localhost:5010', { waitUntil: 'networkidle' }); await p.screenshot({ path: 'playwright-home.png', fullPage: true }); console.log('screenshot saved'); await b.close(); })().catch(e=>{console.error(e); process.exit(1);})"
